name: Here Be Cryptids
description: Hello, novice hunter! Do you dream of hunting down cryptids and fashioning sick weapons and armor out of materials from them? Then Here Be Cryptids is for you! Explore three different areas of an alternate West Virginia where cryptids run rampant! Track down nine of them throughout this Choose-Your-Own-Adventure Game! Discover secret trophies to get the true ending after collecting the right tools for the job! Do you have what it takes to document all of the cryptids and fill your inventory with cool monster loot?
